details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ انناۤ اٰمنا فاغفر لنا ذنوبنا وقنا عذاب النار
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اِنَّنَاۤ اٰمَنَّا فَاغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوۡبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
details.transliteration: Rabbana innana amanna faghfir lana dhunuubana wa qinna 'adhaban-Naar
details.translations: Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire,

pageTitle: Asking forgiveness and protection from hell [3:16]
